channel.title: Loaded save, eveything explodes
channel.description:
Hi,
When I start Black Mesa, after opening the lastest save I've made (on bm_c2a5e), everything on the map explodes, the screen goes white and I die. This didn't happend last time I played, the save was fine. I think the postion of a prop was not saved correctly and it triggers the explosion of the building. The (little) problem is that I'm currently at the entrance of the map, I didn't have visited the building yet. This is not really disturbing for me, but I think reporting this glitch was required.
[tt]status[/tt] dump : [code]hostname: Black Mesa version : 100003/24 100003 insecure map : bm_c2a5e at: -2532 x, 257 y, 44 z tags : players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 1345 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 5 "Death_Miner" STEAM_ID_PENDING 08:16 17 0 active loopback[/code]

item.title: Loaded save, eveything explodes
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
No problem, have fun playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Loaded save, eveything explodes
item.dc:creator: Death_Miner
item.description:
I tried loading a older save, and I didn’t get the bug.
That’s right, the bug comes from the save. Something was not saved correctly and triggers the explosion.

Read full topic

item.title: Loaded save, eveything explodes
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
I’m not a developer but try this.
Try to load a game before that one, then make a save again in the place where your save is now.Then try to reload that new save. See if you die again.If you do, it probably is a bug.
But if you dont then some prop spawning was off by a millimeter.

Read full topic

item.title: Loaded save, eveything explodes
item.dc:creator: Death_Miner
item.description:
Hi,

When I start Black Mesa, after opening the lastest save I’ve made (on bm_c2a5e), everything on the map explodes, the screen goes white and I die.
This didn’t happend last time I played, the save was fine.
I think the postion of a prop was not saved correctly and it triggers the explosion of the building. The (little) problem is that I’m currently at the entrance of the map, I didn’t have visited the building yet.
This is not really disturbing for me, but I think reporting this glitch was required.

version : 100003/24 100003 insecure
map : bm_c2a5e at: -2532 x, 257 y, 44 z
